full_summary:
# RED DEER RIVER ABOVE PANTHER RIVER – 05CA004 – ALBERTA - PASSENGER-OPERATED CABLEWAY REBUILD

## Tender Information

### Contract Number
05CA004

### Solicitation Number
5000075394

### Tender Closing Date
2024-03-20T18:00:00 (Expired)

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-03-28

### Expected Contract End Date
2025-03-31

### Procurement Category
Special Equipment Services (CNST)

### Procurement Method
Competitive – Open Bidding

## Tender Description
The Water Survey of Canada (WSC)/Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires a contractor to construct a new passenger-operated cableway at the Red Deer River above Panther River hydrometric station. The objective is to ensure uninterrupted production of discharge data and maintain safe operations.

The contractor will be responsible for constructing a new cableway within 15 weeks, adhering to all relevant guidelines and standards, and minimizing environmental impact. The project is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

This tender is open to qualified suppliers who can provide the necessary expertise and resources to complete the project. Suppliers interested in participating should review the tender documents and contact Helena Lee at Helena.Lee@ec.gc.ca for more information.

## Tender Documents
Additional information and tender documents are available on the CanadaBuys website.

We hope this rewritten entry meets your expectations! Let us know if you have any further requests.
